txt.en: Plundered dwarf treasure can be found inside the giant-hold of Thyrstáth.\n\nYou should collect plundered dwarf treasures.
Use the summoning horn to call Hórin to your side.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
Hórin has discovered that the ice-giants in Thyrstáth keep treasures of the ancient Gundabad dwarves in their hold.

'While we were making our way through Thyrstáth, I spotted a chest of dwarf-make. The giants must have stolen it from one of our ancient holds in Gundabad! I say we recover such treasures as we can on our way out!'

'For how long have the giants hoarded these dwarf treasures? I am glad to restore them to their rightful holders, though their original owners be long-dead. These artifacts belong to dwarves, not giants, and we will ensure in dwarf-hands they stay from now on!\n\n'Thank you for the help, [placeholder].'
Call Hórin and talk to him
